paragraph: Free Confidential Case Review, No Fees Unless We Recover For You

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Michael Rose and Gregory Hach have dedicated their careers to representing New Yorkers, creating a law firm that has recovered well in excess of one billion dollars for their clients.

detailsData.title: Personal Commitment
detailsData.content: The firm promises personal commitment to their clients, ensuring that they never pay anything unless a financial recovery is made on their behalf.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice
detailsData.content: Hach & Rose, LLP, offers a wide range of practice areas from personal injury to mass tort cases, ensuring clients receive specialized representation for their unique cases.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Representation
detailsData.content: The firm's attorneys have been recognized for their work, including being selected to the New York Super Lawyers list and being lifetime members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

address: 112 Madison Ave, 10th Floor, New York, NY 10016
valueProp: The New York City personal injury attorneys of Hach & Rose, LLP, are dedicated to vigorously protecting the rights and interests of those who have been hurt due to the negligence or recklessness of another party. For more than a decade, Michael Rose and Gregory Hach have dedicated their careers to representing New Yorkers and have partnered to create a law firm that has recovered well in excess of one billion dollars on behalf of their clients. If you have a personal injury claim, contact Michael Rose and Gregory Hach today.

testimonalData.text: Great lawfirm, with some truly amazing people working. Treat you like family even if that means tough love sometimes. Honest, professional, and thorough. I'll be back if ever needed.
testimonalData.author: Thomas Badzio

testimonalData.text: I have worked with Ms. Constance Cooper on a number of cases and I have quite literally never met an attorney who gets as invested in a case as Ms. Cooper. She is passionate about getting her clients exactly what they deserve and is willing to put in any amount of time, effort, and research to ensure a case is handled not just with professionalism, but with perfection.
testimonalData.author: Katryna Spearman
